messages.title: A free NHS
messages.content: It was Labour and the Tories/Libs who brought £79 billion of 'private finance (debt)' into the NHS, and Labour who proposed you should be charged £120 a year to see your GP. UKIP will give £3 billion extra to the NHS to keep it free.

messages.title: Nil tax on the minimum wage
messages.content: Millions of the poorest workers, who work all week for the minimum wage, should not have to pay income tax at all.

messages.title: Housing priority for local people
messages.content: We need to build more social and low-cost housing, on existing sites not green fields, to help local people have their own home.

messages.title: Employment for local people first
messages.content: We need to ensure that local workers are employed as priority before workers from elsewhere. Expand the training opportunities to increase our skill base in order to support manufacturing.

messages.title: Improving Local Infrastructure
messages.content: Better rail and air links to support economic activity locally.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP would keep the NHS free at the point of delivery and give £3 billion extra to the NHS to keep it free.
UKIP would introduce an Australian style, points based, fairer immigration system.
UKIP would have no tax on the minimum wage, no 'bedroom' tax, no inheritance tax.
UKIP would safeguard our steel industry through affordable energy and removal of green taxes.
UKIP says no to £21bn a year membership fees to the EU.
UKIP says no to £12 billion a year in foreign aid to countries like Argentina.

issues.brexitEurope: Continue to trade with the EU and the rest of the world without restrictions.
issues.health: UKIP would keep the NHS free at the point of delivery and give £3 billion extra to the NHS to keep it free.
issues.immigration: UKIP would introduce an Australian style, points based, fairer immigration system.

housing.content: We need to build more social and low-cost housing, on existing sites not green fields, to help local people have their own home.

images.caption: Vote Gallacher - Your Parliamentary Candidate for Redcar
